source.name: Fine tuning
source.instructions: **What is the benefit of fine-tuning over prompt design in OpenAI API?**

answers.answer: Fine-tuning provides higher-quality results than prompt design.
Fine-tuning allows for shorter prompts and therefore less token usage.
Fine-tuning reduces latency in API requests.
Fine-tuning allows training on more examples than can fit in a prompt, leading to better results on a wide range of tasks.

source.guidance: Fine-tuning allows training on more examples than can fit in a prompt, leading to better results on a wide range of tasks.
